title: Grand Canyon National Park: Teacher Workshops
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Professional Development     Teacher Workshops                Teacher Workshops       Grand Canyon National Park offers teacher workshops for continuing education credit. Would you like to use Grand Canyon as a teaching tool in your classroom? Attend a teacher workshop and learn how Grand Canyon can benefit you and your students. Participants will engage in activities, games, and lesson plans that you can use with your students. Workshops generally occur in the fall, topics vary each year and are related to the natural and cultural resources of Grand Canyon. Registration fee: $50  Enrollment is first-come, first-served. Participants receive continuing education credit hours. Registration for the 2016-2017 school-year workshops will open August 17, 2016. More information coming soon.
